text: Ibn Battuta, (1304 – 1368 or 1369) was a Muslim Moroccan scholar and explorer Ibn Battuta or other spelling variants may refer to: *Ibn Battuta (crater), a crater on the Moon *Ibn Battuta: The Animated Series, Malaysian animated series about travels of Ibn Battuta *Ibn Battouta Airport, Tangier, Morocco *Ibn Battouta Stadium, Tangier, Morocco ==See also== *Batuta (disambiguation)
title: Ibn Battuta (disambiguation)
